summary: Play as the Ancient Falmer in a lore-friendly way with balanced, Imperious-style abilities.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#6fa8dc][size=6][b]Falmerious - Snow Elves of Skyrim[/b][/size][/color]


[b][size=3]Falmerious implements Skyrim's lost race, the ancient Falmer, as a playable race in a lore friendly way. Don't forget to endorse if you like it![/size]

[b][size=6]I have begun a mod that is going to add NPCs of my various races throughout Skyrim. [/size][size=6]If you would like to contribute to the project, either as a quest scripter, writer, or even a dungeon designer, send me a message!
[/size]
[b][size=6][b]You can find updates on the Zebsirious NPC Expansion as well as any of my other projects [url=https://zebsimods.blogspot.com/]here[/url]﻿![/b][/size]
[/b]
[size=5]This mod is out of date. An updated version can be found [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88919]here[/url]﻿, as part of my Zebsirious race compilation.[/size][/b]
[color=#6fa8dc][size=5]Features[/size][/color][/b]

[list]
[*][size=3]A new playable race, the Snow Elf[/size]
[*][size=3]Imperious-style stats and abilities[/size]
[*][size=3]A small player home[/size]
[*][size=3]A temple to the Falmeri pantheon[/size]
[*][size=3]A new set of robes[/size]
[/list]
[size=4][b][color=#6fa8dc]Snow Elf skill bonuses[/color][/b]
[/size]
+10 Destruction
+10 Archery
+5 Light Armor
+5 One Handed
+5 Conjuration
+5 Restoration

[size=4][b][color=#6fa8dc]Stats and abilities[/color][/b]

[/size]Health: 100
Magicka: 105
Stamina: 95
Health regeneration: 0.75%
Magicka regeneration: 3.125%
Stamina regeneration: 4.875%
Carry Weight: 275

[list]
[*][b]Permafrost[/b]: Your ice-coated skin freezes the air around you, draining 10 stamina per second from enemies in melee range.
[*][b]Frozen Spirit[/b]: Frost resistance increases as health decreases.
[*][b]Blood and Snow[/b]: Frost spells and placed frost enchantments are 20% stronger.
[/list]
[color=#6fa8dc][b]Quest* reward - Find the Ancient Falmeri Temple to unlock[/b][/color]
[b]Touch of Winter[/b]: [i]1/day - [/i]Encase surrounding enemies in ice for 20 seconds. Frozen enemies take reduced damage.

*I didn't actually create a quest to unlock the power. Instead, there is a book on the table in the temple's bedroom that will give the power if read by a Snow Elf.

[color=#6fa8dc][size=4][b]The Temple
[/b][/size][/color]
Somewhere in the northeastern, frozen parts of Skyrim, a temple to the Falmeri pantheon can be found. In addition to shrines to Auri-el, Phynaster, Syrabane, Trinimac, and Y'ffre, the temple contains a bedroom with basic necessities, along with a set of Ancient Falmer Robes in the wardrobe.

There are no in-game hints as to the temple's location, but for those who don't want to spend the time finding it, I've included a second ReadMe with its location in the download.

[b][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]The Shrines[/size]

[/color][/b][color=#6fa8dc]Shrine of Auri-el: [/color][color=#ffffff]Bows do 25% more damage[/color]
[color=#6fa8dc]Shrine of Phynaster: [/color][color=#ffffff]+50 health[/color]
[color=#6fa8dc]Shrine of Syrabane: [/color][color=#ffffff]+50 magicka[/color]
[color=#6fa8dc]Shrine of Trinimac: [/color][color=#ffffff]+50 stamina[/color]
[color=#6fa8dc]Shrine of Y'ffre: [/color][color=#ffffff]Health, magicka, and stamina regenerate 50% faster[/color]

[color=#6fa8dc][size=4][b]Requirements[/b][/size][/color]

[list]
[*][size=2]Skyrim[/size]
[*][size=2]Update 1.9[/size]
[*][size=2]Dawnguard[/size]
[*][size=2]Dragonborn[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10165]RacialCompatibility.esm[/url]﻿[/size]
[*][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard[/url]﻿ (overwrite the files in RacialCompatibility with TMPhoenix's files)[/size]
[/list]
[color=#6fa8dc][size=4][b]Compatibility[/b][/size][/color]

[color=#ffffff]The only incompatibilites I can think of would be those that add new areas to the same area as the temple in Winterhold, but I haven't run into any problems with my 100+ mods installed.[/color]

[color=#ffffff]A bashed patch may be necessary for compatibility with mods that edit headparts formlists.[/color]

[size=4][b][color=#6fa8dc]Permissions[/color][/b]
[/size]
I used several assets from other authors, so you must get their permission before using anything from this mod.

[color=#ffffff]But as long as I am credited and notified, you may, without my permission:[/color]
[list]
[*][size=2]Upload translations of this mod[/size]
[*][size=2]Make compatibility patches for this mod[/size]
[*][size=2]Port this mod over to SSE[/size]
[/list]
[color=#ffffff]If you'd like to use assets of this mod for any other reason, you must get my permission first. [/color]

[b][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]Recommended[/size] [size=4]Mods[/size][/color][/b]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87874]Dwemerious[/url] - My Imperious-esque Dwemer race mod
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88501]Maormerious[/url] - My Imperious-esque Maormer race mod
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url] - As Falmerious uses faces from elven races, EEO will give Snow Elves drastic improvements.[/size]
[color=#0000ff][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] [/color][color=#ffffff]- Character Creation is just as important as racial stats and abilities.
[/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86234/]Snow Elf Robes[/url] - For your Snow Elf mage.

[b][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]Credits
[/size][/color][/b]EnaiSiaion for [size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61218]inspiration
[/url][/size]MSLexis for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41794]original mod[/url]﻿
expired6978 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10165]RacialCompatibility[/url]
TMPhoenix for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard[/url]
Nickorasu for the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85392]Falmeri shrines[/url]﻿
cad435 for the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70099/]Ancient Falmer Temple Architexture[/url]﻿
Hallgarth for the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73855/]bed, candles, and cutlery
[/url]Tcain99 for the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86234/]Snow Elf Robes[/url]
author: Zebsi

files.name: Falmerious - Snow Elves of Skyrim
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed issue where Permafrost would cause bounties from brawls
Changed the magnitude of Blood and Snow from 25% to 20%
Removed the Ancient Falmer Armor set from the wardrobe in the temple; Replaced it with Ancient Falmer Robes
